tasks.details: Find the Logo Header section. Change the logo div from 'text-3xl sm:text-4xl md:text-5xl font-light lowercase tracking-wide' to 'text-2xl sm:text-3xl md:text-4xl font-extralight lowercase tracking-[0.2em] text-foreground/90'. Add animate-float to the moon emoji span with style animationDuration 6s.

tasks.description: Apply text-display class to hero title
tasks.details: Find the h1 with id='hero-title'. Replace the className 'text-4xl sm:text-5xl md:text-7xl font-light tracking-wider text-foreground' with 'text-display text-foreground/95'.

tasks.description: Add primary color to rotating word
tasks.details: Find the span that contains TITLE_ROTATIONS[currentTitleIndex]. Add 'text-primary/90' to its className so the rotating word stands out with the accent color.

Find the p tag with 'personalized audio experiences for rest, focus & relaxation'. Change text to 'personalized audio for rest, focus & relaxation' (shorter). Change className to 'text-base md:text-lg text-muted-foreground/70 font-light tracking-wide max-w-md mx-auto'.
Find the Hero Section's parent section element. Change 'mb-16 sm:mb-20' to 'mb-20 sm:mb-24' for more breathing room. Also change 'space-y-6 sm:space-y-8' to 'space-y-8 sm:space-y-10'.

Find the Example Audio Buttons section. Update the button className to add 'backdrop-blur-sm' and change border from 'border-border/50' to 'border-border/30'. The full unselected state should be: 'border-border/30 bg-card/30 backdrop-blur-sm hover:bg-card/50 hover:border-border/50'.

Above the flex container with example buttons, add a paragraph:

listen

. This adds context for what the buttons do.

tasks.description: Add hover scale to example buttons
tasks.details: Add 'transform hover:scale-[1.02] active:scale-[0.98]' to the example button className for micro-interaction feedback.
Find the Textarea component. Change placeholder from the long text to simply: 'describe how you want to feel...'

tasks.description: Refine textarea border and focus states
tasks.details: Update Textarea className from 'bg-card/70 border-border/90 hover:bg-card/75 focus:bg-card/80 focus:border-border' to 'bg-card/40 border-border/30 hover:bg-card/50 focus:bg-card/60 focus:border-primary/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/20'.

Before the Textarea div, add:

create your vibe

Find the prompt example buttons. Update className to: 'px-4 py-2 rounded-full text-xs font-medium tracking-wide bg-card/30 border border-border/20 hover:bg-card/50 hover:border-primary/30 text-foreground/60 hover:text-foreground/80 transition-all duration-300 ease-out'. Remove the inner span with blur effect.

Find the 'or explore curated experiences' div. Wrap the p tag in a flex container with lines:

...

tasks.description: Apply text-micro class to divider text
tasks.details: Change the p className from 'text-sm text-muted-foreground/60 lowercase tracking-wider' to 'text-micro text-muted-foreground/40'.
Change the parent div className from 'text-center mb-10' to 'text-center py-16 mb-8' for more breathing room around the divider.

Find the TabsList component. Update className from 'bg-card/20 backdrop-blur-md p-1.5 rounded-xl border border-border/20' to 'bg-card/30 backdrop-blur-lg p-2 rounded-2xl border border-border/10 shadow-lg shadow-black/5'.

tasks.description: Unify generate button styles across tabs
tasks.details: Find all three generate buttons (presets, binaural, voice). Ensure they all have: 'w-full py-6 text-base font-medium lowercase tracking-wide bg-primary hover:bg-primary/90 hover:shadow-lg hover:shadow-primary/20 transition-all duration-300'. Remove any emoji from button text, use clean text only.
Find all tip/note paragraphs at the bottom of tabs (the ones with italic). Remove 'italic' class and change to 'text-micro text-muted-foreground/40' for consistency. Remove emoji from tips.
In src/components/AmbientBackground.tsx, find the opacity variable. Change 'opacity-[0.15]' to 'opacity-[0.20]' for home state.
In AmbientBackground.tsx, find the filter style on the video element. Change 'brightness(0.6)' to 'brightness(0.7)' for slightly more visible video.

In AmbientBackground.tsx, find the gradient overlay div. Change from 'bg-gradient-to-br from-primary/10 via-transparent to-accent/10' to 'bg-gradient-to-b from-background/80 via-transparent to-background/60' for better text readability.
